how to install office 2007 in ubuntu: You can do it in Wine, but  there are also document viewers you can use from Microsoft,  and alternative programs such as Open Office, KOffice,  Abiword, and Gnumeric a spread sheet app.
Microsoft have its Microsoft Office 2010 web apps, for free now,  that works in non Windows OS's as well

Then you can make docuemnts using that and open them I guess.  and  I think theres still a free document viewer for Office files from Microsoft that  should work in Wine.  So you probably don't really need to run Office 2007 in Wine :)
